archimate:Grouping.name: SOGP Environmental Threat Events
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
This grouping shows threat events from the Threat Event Catalogue in the Standard Of Good Practice.
It presents the threat events that could be initiated by the threats within the environmental threat group (e.g. fire, hardware malfunction/failure and tsunami). This group includes threats which are outside the control of the organisation, such as natural or man-made hazards, or failures of critical infrastructure, that act to cause harm to an organisationâ€™s information or systems.
